member.summary: Web.config option name for store Username for access to SQL Server

member.summary: Web.config option name for define pre-defined .resx-file with language

member.summary: Option for show languages selector. By default is true

member.summary: Web.config option name for use Application via forced SSL connection

member.summary: Web.config option name for use secure connections for SMTP

member.summary: Web.config option name for store FogBugz URL (http://)

member.summary: Web.config option name for store FogBugz ScoutName for post feedbacks

member.summary: Web.config option name for store FogBugz ScoutProject for post feedbacks

member.summary: Web.config option name for store FogBugz ScoutArea for post feedbacks

member.name: F:ExpertChoice.Web.WebOptions._OPT_FOGBUGZ_INBOX
member.summary: Mailbox for sending bug reports to FogBugz inbox
member.remarks: By default is empty. Use address like "cases@....fogbugz.com"

member.name: F:ExpertChoice.Web.WebOptions._OPT_FOGBUGZ_AUTOSUBMIT
member.summary: FogBugz feedback submission: 1 for auto-submit and hide "Feedback" button. By default is disabled for local instances.

member.name: F:ExpertChoice.Web.WebOptions._OPT_TRACE_ENABLED
member.summary: Option for enable/disabled trace/output info. Set "1" for enable when debugging. By default is "0".

member.summary: Web.config option name for store project lock timeout

member.summary: Web.config option name for store LoadOnDemand option

member.summary: Period in second for send request on Evaluation screen during Synchronous sessions

member.name: F:ExpertChoice.Web.WebOptions._OPT_SHOW_DRAFT
member.summary: Show unfinished screens in navigation

member.name: F:ExpertChoice.Web.WebOptions._OPT_SLSHELL_BY_DEFAULT
